subject: Olympic Games (2006)
Cross-Country Skiing
lead_paragraph: Robel Teklemariam, the first Ethiopian Winter Olympian, discusses his path to becoming a ski racer and his mission to represent Ethiopia in the 2006 Olympic Games. Prod: Kassie Bracken
snippet: Robel Teklemariam, the first Ethiopian Winter Olympian, discusses his path to becoming a ski racer and his mission to represent Ethiopia in the 2006 Olympic Games. Prod: Kassie Bracken
